properties.name: type
properties.desc: The UI type of button. It's an enum and the possible values are 'primary', 'secondary' and 'tertiary'.

properties.name: behavior
properties.desc: Equivalent to the HTML button's type. It's an enum and the possible values are 'button', 'submit', 'search' or 'reset'.

events.name: button-blur
events.desc: This event is fired whenever the button blurs out.
